mapper.insert: insert into tactics (tactics_name, account_id,variety_id, follow_manner, max_profit, max_profit_number, max_loss, max_loss_number, account_loss, order_point, client_point, client_point_number, net_position_direction, net_position_change, net_position_follow_number, net_position_sum, net_position_hold_number, net_position_status,version) values (#{tacticsName}, #{account.id},#{variety.id}, #{followManner}, #{maxProfit}, #{maxProfitNumber}, #{maxLoss}, #{maxLossNumber}, #{accountLoss}, #{orderPoint}, #{clientPoint}, #{clientPointNumber}, #{netPositionDirection}, #{netPositionChange}, #{netPositionFollowNumber}, #{netPositionSum}, #{netPositionHoldNumber}, #{netPositionStatus},#{version} )
mapper.update:
update tactics
tactics_name = #{tacticsName},
account_id = #{account.id},
variety_id = #{variety.id},
follow_manner = #{followManner},
max_profit = #{maxProfit},
max_profit_number = #{maxProfitNumber},
max_loss = #{maxLoss},
max_loss_number = #{maxLossNumber},
account_loss = #{accountLoss},
order_point = #{orderPoint},
client_point = #{clientPoint},
client_point_number = #{clientPointNumber},
net_position_direction = #{netPositionDirection},
net_position_change = #{netPositionChange},
net_position_follow_number = #{netPositionFollowNumber},
net_position_sum =#{netPositionSum},
net_position_hold_number = #{netPositionHoldNumber},
net_position_status = #{netPositionStatus},
version = #{version} + 1
where id = #{id} and version = #{version}
mapper.sql: id, tactics_name, account_id, variety_id, follow_manner, max_profit, max_profit_number, max_loss, max_loss_number, account_loss, order_point, client_point, client_point_number, net_position_direction, net_position_change, net_position_follow_number, net_position_sum, net_position_hold_number, net_position_status, version
